arts.ttl: ‘Fits the bill’ – Arsenal zoom in on signing, Mikel Arteta key as bargain available
arts.sum: As ever, and perhaps more than usual, there are many players who have contracts expiring at the end of June who don’t look close to agreeing renewals. That means they can talk to other clubs right now, and potentially then leave on a free transfer come the summer. Indeed, it’s even possible to reach an The post ‘Fits the bill’ – Arsenal zoom in on signing, Mikel Arteta key as bargain available appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich boss Vincent Kompany heaps praise on squad for winning effort vs. Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Bayern Munich manager Vincent Kompany rarely gets too high or too low, so it was a relatively big moment for the coach to — gasp — throw some kudos (and maybe smile!) over to his squad after taking down Bayer Leverkusen 2-0 (5-0 on aggregate) in the Champions League . Looking for more thoughts and analysis on Bayern Munich big Champions League victory over Bayer Leverkusen?

arts.ttl: Daily Schmankerl: The aftermath of Bayern Munich vs. Bayer Leverkusen in the Champions League; Manchester City in talks with Florian Wirtz; Jeremie Frimpong wants move to FC Barcelona or Real Madrid; and MORE!
arts.sum: Linked to Bayern Munich consistently over the past year, Sport Bild is reporting that Simons has not produced to the level expected (seven goals, four assists in 24 games across all competitions), has become lackadaisical with his defending, and is not open to feedback: Bayer Leverkusen ace Florian Wirtz is the apple of Bayern Munich’s eye...but Manchester City is reportedly in talks with the attacking midfielder’s representatives:

arts.ttl: Harry Kane satisfied with Bayern Munich’s dominant showing vs. Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Bayern Munich took down Bayer Leverkusen 2-0 in the Champions League and advanced to the next round of the competition by a score of 5-0 on aggregate. Beating a team like Leverkusen 5-0 in two games shows how good we are.

arts.ttl: Official: Bayern Munich will face Inter Milan in the Champions League quarterfinals
arts.sum: Having put Bayer Leverkusen to the sword, Bayern Munich ’s next opponent in the Champions League will be Inter Milan . The last time Bayern faced Inter in the Champions League was back in the 2022/23 season’s group stage, when Julian Nagelsmann was still in charge.

arts.ttl: Match Awards from Bayern Munich’s satisfying 2-0 (5-0) Champions League win over Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Davies played a fantastic game on the defensive end of the pitch but will earn an award today for his work in the attack. Harry Kane opened the scoring in the 52nd minute and Alphonso Davies put the game away in the 71st minute.

arts.ttl: Bavarian Podcast Works — Postgame Show: Bayer Leverkusen 0-2 Bayern Munich (Champions League)
arts.sum: Let’s dive into this one on the Bavarian Podcast Works — Postgame Show: Let’s talk about all of that and more on the Bavarian Podcast Work — Postgame Show.

arts.ttl: Five Observations from Bayern Munich’s emphatic 2-0 win against Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: The game started off with Kingsley Coman and Michael Olise on the left and right wings, Jamal Musiala at attacking midfield and Harry Kane as the centre-forward. Perhaps the only gripe with the attack was the number of times a singular player would make his way to the box surrounded by multiple Leverkusen defenders and turn around to see no one to pass too.

arts.ttl: Harry Kane breaks Champions League record as staggering Bayern Munich form continues
arts.sum: Harry Kane is enjoying another prolific campaign for Bayern Munich and helped fire them into the quarter-finals of the Champions League as they knocked out rivals Bayer Leverkusen

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso's coaching career at a crossroads after UCL exit
arts.sum: For Xabi Alonso and Leverkusen, this season was all about the Champions League. Now that quest is over, what's next for one of Europe's most in-demand coaches?
